attributes.insurance_notes: 2024.03.05 Called Carrier - Obtained Claim & Adj Info - Emailed LOR to Adj Smith, 2024.03.07 Recvd LOR Ack w/FROI, PR & Employee Statement Questionnaire - Ack'd - Requested Preservation of Any & All Dash Cam (if available) Footage or any other recordings - Requested copies be sent to us, 2024.03.28 Called Adj to FU on Confirmation of Claim Acceptance - Check on TTD Status - FU on Copy of File including AWW Calculations, 2024.03.28 Per Adj - She has not requested AWW Info - She has not requested MRs - Attempted to place fault on Client - Advised irrelevant - Attempted to state Client was terminated - Advised again irrelevant  - Adj Agreed both irrelevant - She will request MRs & AWW Info today, 2024.04.04 Recvd Notice Claim Accepted - Adj Needs OWN before issuing TTD - Also Requested Form 106 & 113 - Ack'd - Advised awaiting MRs - Sent Form 106 & 113, 2024.07.15 Called Adj - LVM - Requested Return Call to Discuss Client Tx - Need new Provider, 2024.07.19 Attempted to call Adj & Carrier again - LVM - Other Claimants w/Same Carrier was notified her Adj is no longer with the company, 2024.08.26 Recvd WC Adj email - Approved 12 additional visits - Awaiting some verification for TTD, 2024.08.27 Recvd Taylor Co Chiro CMR - Sent to WC Adj for TTD - Dr did not place off work but did note 'seated occupation' is delaying/limiting progress, 2024.10.08 Recvd Tx Update - BK s/w Provider - Sent Upd & Requested AWW Documents, 2025.03.14 Still have not received Proper Wage Docs - Called Adj - LVM - Called Generic Customer Service - LVM

2024.10.01 Client was driving for Bluegrass Taxi - Unable to locate KY DWC Insurance - Called KY DWC for Claim Look Up - No Claims w/DOI - Client had prior claims in 1998 & 1999, 2024.10.09 Still awaiting WC Docs - Unable to Located via Lookup - KY DWC has no record of incident

2024.09.30 Recvd CPD MB UL Phy (ER, Pathology & FU Visit) - Sent to WC Adjuster for Payment Processing, 2024.09.30 Recvd WC Resp - 1 MB was Paid (EOB was supposed to be attached but was not) - She will call about other 2 bills, 2024.09.30 Recvd EOB - UL Phy Pathology - Billed $146.00 - WC paid 88.56 - Adj 93.21, 2024.09.30 Recvd WC Adj Secure Email: I called on these 2. On the $20.00 bill Megan was very casual about it and said several time not to worry. I reiterated that per the statement the original bill was submitted to his blue cross personal insurance and she again was very casual stating not to worry. I reiterated again that we needed a HFCA bill to pay this. - Attached CPD Billing w/Notes
2025.02.19: Client recvd VM from WC Adj - Sent Info to Us - Sent LOR - Called LVM
